desc: Ditch the spoon and bowl and take your cereal on-the-go with the ultra-portable CrunchCup®. Whether you're sitting on the couch, at your desk, or on the move, you can enjoy your cereal anywhere with this dual-chambered, reusable, dishwasher safe tumbler, made of extremely durable, BPA-free plastic.

layout.text:
NO SPOON
NO BOWL
IT'S CEREAL
ON THE GO
